alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Moore (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 22 at 7:49PM CST until February 22 at 8:15PM CST by NWS Huntsville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Huntsville Alabama has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Moore County in Middle Tennessee... Lincoln County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 815 PM CST. * At 749 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ardmore, or 14 miles southeast of Pulaski, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fayetteville, Lynchburg, Ardmore, Lincoln, Mulberry, Howell, Belleville, Dellrose, Belleview and Mimosa. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CST for north central and northeastern Alabama.
